info.title: Laravel Article API Documentation
info.description: This is the central API documentation for the article management system, including both user and admin endpoints.

get.summary: Display a dynamic feed or list of articles
get.description: Returns articles in two modes: 'feed' (structured dashboard with Trending, Most Read, Latest Global) or 'list' (filtered, paginated list with metadata). Performance is optimized via Database lookups.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Operational mode. Defaults to 'feed' if no filters are present, or 'list' if search is provided.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Keyword search in titles and summaries. Forces mode=list if mode is not specified.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter results by category name (e.g., 'Real Estate', 'Business')

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (used in 'list' mode)
